name: Livestreamer Assistant
body:
### Ease of use.
Livestreamer Assistant is a simple GUI for streaming video through VLC media player.

![](https://github.com/WTFender/Livestreamer-Assistant/blob/master/Live%20Streamer%20Assistant/Resources/UIexample.jpg)

Livestreamer Assistant is designed with Twitch Integration in mind, but has basic support for all Livestreamer supported streaming services.

### Questions? Comments?
Please direct all feedback to wtfender.cs@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
